inclusion.criterion: unusual, interesting, or unknown ocular condition
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: disease-free control participant in an NEI clinical research study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: affected first-degree relative of a participant with either a diagnosed or undiagnosed ocular disorder
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: ability to understand and sign an informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: unwilling or unable to cooperate with the study procedures
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: female participants of childbearing potential who are pregnant
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week, smokes 22 cigarettes per day, but is otherwise healthy with no history of allergies or using any medications.
